title: Aromatherapy Products | Homeopathic Remedies | Thatcher, AZ
description: Lee's Rite-Way Market in Thatcher, AZ offers organic and natural food. Visit us for natural and organic products at affordable prices.

Aromatherapy & Homeopathy Aromatherapy and Homeopathy Products 10% Senior Citizen Discounts | Over 15 Years of Experience | Affordable Prices Boost your mood and psychological health with superior aromatherapy products from Lee's Rite-Way Market. You'll be delighted to learn that aromatherapy helps your physical well-being too! You'll get 20 different types of products from brands like doTERRA, Young Living, NOW Foods, and others at our store. We also have essential oil products from brands like Breathe and OnGuard. These are sold by the drop as well as in large quantities. What's more, we have diffusers and empty containers for you to mix and match the aromas from different products! 10% OFF our products for senior citizens only! Homeopathic Remedies for Your Immune System You can ward off diseases and develop a solid immune system with the help of homeopathic products from Lee's Rite-Way Market in Thatcher, AZ. We have selected homeopathic products from brands like Hyland's, BOIRON, and BNT that come in an array of extracts and strengths. Along with a wide collection of aromatherapy and homeopathic products, we stock gluten-free products, vitamin supplements, organic produce, meal replacements, and exotic herbs and teas. Visit our store at 2910 W US Hwy 70, Ste B for more information. Visit Us for Natural and Organic Products at Affordable Prices.
